name: Bean Factory
description:
A hungry skeleton and his uh... actually nothing need your help! He's hungry and he need you to feed him with beans. In exchange he's gonna pay you and you can expand your factory even more with earned money. Hard work... ufff

Build your own Bean Factory™ and FEED THE SKELETON ALREADY. HE'S DYING OF... wait, WHO THE HELL WROTE THIS?!. There's no way i'm reading this, do you not know how STUPID this sounds?! Just no, i won't continue reading this any further.
Why are you still here?? Go play the game now!

Play now on Core Bean Factory - Factory builder!
